tests.name: Environment Activation
tests.command: source $(conda info --base)/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate ./env && python -c 'import sys; print(sys.executable)'

tests.name: Server Import
tests.command: source $(conda info --base)/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate ./env && python -c 'from src.server import mcp; print("Import successful")'

tests.name: RDKit Import
tests.command: source $(conda info --base)/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate ./env && python -c 'from rdkit import Chem; print("RDKit OK")'
